column4: i have a new problem: installed beryl in gutsy by downloading and installing the .debs, does work indeed, effects show, everything okay. BUT: all windows dont have any borders anymore, not even the top bar with the title in it.. so im not able to move the windows or anything. what ca i do? emerald is installed and choosen in beryl-manager as window decorator
beryl is depreciated, support is in #compiz-fusion for it.
of course, it is, bu it killed two systems so far.. ill never do that graphical thingy again...
